summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1348, for the improvement of the alley in block seventy-six (76), A. A. Denny's Extension to Terry's Addition, lying between Ninth Avenue and Terry Avenue, and Madison Street and Spring Street, in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, under Ordinance No. 14996 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
